about_the_game:
Crime strikes again, this time, at the luxurious inauguration to a charity gala! Miss Mishelle Shellington has had her pearl necklace stolen - and there's only one fish who's got the wits, the keen detective skills, and the glistening fish scales to put the culprit behind bars in this noir themed whodunnit...

Enter Detective Bass!

Detective Bass 2: The Case of the Stolen Pearls is a witty, narrative-driven detective game, where the player must investigate, follow leads, and interrogate suspects to solve this crime. Take notes in your trusty detective pad, look for clues with your magnifying glass, and get to the bottom of this mystery using your sharp analytical skills and quick thinking fish brain!
